issues.description: The public Farm method defined in the problem statement and starter template is named `singFarmSong()`, but the reference solution renames it to `playFarmSong()`. Students looking for `singFarmSong()` to implement or call will not find it in the solution, causing confusion in mapping the required API.
issues.suggested_fix: Rename the solutionâ€™s `playFarmSong()` method to `singFarmSong()` to match the problem statement and template API.
